//
//   Name                          Reg   Size
//   ----------------------------- ----- ----
//   ViewProjectionMatrix          c0       4
//   CameraPositionVS              c4       1
//   LocalToWorld                  c6       4
//   TemporalAAParameters          c10      1
//   TerrainLayerCoordinateOffset  c11      1
//   InvMaxTesselationLevel_ZScale c12      1
//   InvTerrainSize_SectionBase    c13      1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c5, 256, -32768, 1, 0
    def c14, 0.5, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_tangent v1
    dcl_texcoord o0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord1 o1.xy
    dcl_texcoord6 o2
    dcl_texcoord7 o3
    dcl_position o4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mad r0.x, v0.w, c5.x, v0.z
    add r0.x, r0.x, c5.y
    mul r0.z, r0.x, c12.y
    mov r1.x, c12.x
    mad r0.xy, v0, r1.x, c13.zwzw
    add o0.xyz, r0, c11
    add r0.xy, r0, c14.x
    mul o1.xy, r0, c13
    mul r0.xy, c12.x, v0
    mul r1, r0.y, c7
    mad r1, c6, r0.x, r1
    mad r0, c8, r0.z, r1
    add r0, r0, c9
    mad r1.xyz, r0, -c4.w, c4
    mul r1.xy, r1, c12.zwzw
    dp3 r2.x, r1, c6
    dp3 r2.y, r1, c7
    dp3 r2.z, r1, c8
    mul r1.xy, c12.y, v1
    mov r1.zw, c5
    nrm r3.xyz, r1.zwxw
    nrm r4.xyz, r1.wzyw
    dp3 o3.x, r3, r2
    dp3 o3.y, r4, r2
    mul r1.xyz, r3.zxyw, r4.yzxw
    mad r1.xyz, r3.yzxw, r4.zxyw, -r1
    dp3 o3.z, r1, r2
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c3, r0.w, r1
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c10.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c10, r0

mov o4, r0 // Relocated from line 72 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 97AFF2FC.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s3
add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o2, r0

//     mov o4, r0 // Relocated to line 71 with shadertool.py
    mov o3.w, c5.z

// approximately 40 instruction slots used
